title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, goals, and requirements. Conduct market research, gather user feedback, and document functional and non-functional requirements.

title: System Architecture Design for ARBankingInterface
description: Design the overall system architecture for the ARBankingInterface project. This includes creating a robust and scalable AR interface, defining backend services, database structure (with emphasis on normalization, optimization, denormalization for real-time data access), and security considerations such as encryption methods (AES-256 for sensitive data) and access controls (OAuth2.0). The technology stack will be defined with an explicit focus on integration points, data flow optimization, microservices architecture, and containerization (Docker or Kubernetes). The design aims to ensure high performance, maintainability, and scalability, while considering the importance of user experience, accessibility, cross-platform compatibility, and adherence to mobile-first principles. Upon completion, a detailed documentation including diagrams, flowcharts, and explanations will be provided for easier understanding and implementation. To enhance this RFC, consider incorporating specific metrics or KPIs (such as response time, concurrency, throughput, and error rates) to measure system performance and scalability, and ensure the design is flexible enough to accommodate future updates or integrations. Additionally, include guidelines for monitoring and logging to help diagnose and resolve issues quickly. Suggest a timeline for task completion, considering approximately 6-8 weeks for completion, and identify potential roadblocks that may arise during implementation such as resource constraints, technical limitations, or evolving user requirements. Lastly, suggest a task decomposer to break down the design into manageable tasks for the development team.

title: User Interface and Experience Design
description: Design the user interface and experience for the AR banking interface, including 3D models, animations, and interaction patterns.

title: Backend Services Development
description: Develop the backend services for handling banking transactions, data processing, and integration with existing banking systems.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema for storing user data, transaction history, and other relevant information.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the system adheres to security best practices and complies with relevant banking regulations and data privacy laws.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop test plans, create test cases, and perform thorough testing of the AR banking interface, including functional, usability, and performance testing.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment infrastructure, create deployment pipelines, and automate the deployment process for the AR banking interface and its components.

title: Documentation and User Support
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the AR banking interface, including user guides, developer documentation, and support resources.
